snippet.title: The Sims™ 4 Werewolves: Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Transform and embrace (or fight) your animalistic nature with The Sims™ 4 Werewolves Game Pack*, launching June 16 at 10 a.m. PT. Preorder today!**
 
What kind of wolf do you want to be? Whether you feel more like a lone wolf, part of the pack, or an alpha is just part of your werewolf identity. Try out new temperaments and abilities, be affected by the phase of the moon, and experience wolf-specific life events as you explore the (not-so) abandoned town of Moonwood Mill and unravel lycanthrope lore.

Available June 16 at 10 a.m. PT on Origin PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5.

Learn more about this Game Pack: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/packs/game-packs/the-sims-4-werewolves 

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THE PACK.

**Conditions & restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/packs/game-packs/the-sims-4-werewolves for details.
